languages.text: {n}Девушка резко втягивает воздух, между бровей на секунду возникает морщинка.{/n} "Жизнь дана {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатору{/g} лишь для служения Дому. Каждый вздох, каждое слово, каждое деяние наше — во благо и преуспеяние его. Взирая на меня, не видя Дома, вы видите лишь тень преходящего. Если вам важно лишь это — спрашивайте".

traits.locale_text: {n}Девушка смущенно отводит взгляд.{/n} "Если вас интересует что-то конкретное..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка резко втягивает воздух, между бровей на секунду возникает морщинка.{/n} "Жизнь дана {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатору{/g} лишь для служения Дому. Каждый вздох, каждое слово, каждое деяние наше — во благо и преуспеяние его. Взирая на меня, не видя Дома, вы видите лишь тень преходящего. Если вам важно лишь это — спрашивайте".

traits.locale_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny wrinkle appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A Navigator is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is meant to do it good and to bring prosperity. By looking at me and not seeing the House you only see a fleeting shadow. If this is what interests you, ask."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅深吸一口气。那一刻，她的眉毛之间浮现了一条浅浅的皱纹。{/n}“每位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}之所以被赋予生命，仅仅是为了侍奉他们的家族。我们的每次呼吸，每一句话，做的每一件事，都是为了我们家族的利益和繁荣。如果你打算把我从我的家族中剥离出来，那你只会看到一个转瞬即逝的影子。如果这就是你感兴趣的话题，那尽管问吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅深吸一口气。那一刻，她的眉毛之间浮现了一条浅浅的皱纹。{/n}“每位{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}之所以被赋予生命，仅仅是为了侍奉他们的家族。我们的每次呼吸，每一句话，做的每一件事，都是为了我们家族的利益和繁荣。如果你打算把我从我的家族中剥离出来，那你只会看到一个转瞬即逝的影子。如果这就是你感兴趣的话题，那尽管问吧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A Navigator is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

languages.text: {n}La joven respira bruscamente y por un momento frunce el ceño.{/n} «Una {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} solo tiene el don de la vida para servir a su casa. Cada aliento, cada palabra y cada acción es por el bien y la prosperidad de la casa. Al mirarme y no ver la casa, solo está contemplando una sombra efímera. Pero si es eso lo que le interesa, pregunte».
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}La joven respira bruscamente y por un momento frunce el ceño.{/n} «Una {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} solo tiene el don de la vida para servir a su casa. Cada aliento, cada palabra y cada acción es por el bien y la prosperidad de la casa. Al mirarme y no ver la casa, solo está contemplando una sombra efímera. Pero si es eso lo que le interesa, pregunte».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}その若き女性は、一瞬眉間に小さなしわを寄せて、鋭く息を吸い込んだ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}は一族に仕えるためだけに命を与えられています。私たちのすべての呼吸、すべての言葉、すべての行いは、一族の利益と繁栄のためにあるのです。私を見て、一族を見ないということは、儚い影を見ているようなものです。そんなことに関心があるというのなら、どうぞお尋ねください」
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}その若き女性は、一瞬眉間に小さなしわを寄せて、鋭く息を吸い込んだ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}は一族に仕えるためだけに命を与えられています。私たちのすべての呼吸、すべての言葉、すべての行いは、一族の利益と繁栄のためにあるのです。私を見て、一族を見ないということは、儚い影を見ているようなものです。そんなことに関心があるというのなら、どうぞお尋ねください」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die junge Frau atmet scharf ein. Für den Bruchteil einer Sekunde erscheint zwischen ihren Augenbrauen eine winzige Furche.{/n} "Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} erhält sein Leben nur, um seinem Haus zu dienen. Jeder unser Atemzüge, jedes Wort, jede Tat dienen nur dem Wohl und Reichtum unseres Hauses. Wenn Ihr mich anseht und nicht das Haus seht, seht Ihr nur einen flüchtigen Schatten. Wenn es das ist, was Euch interessiert, fragt."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die junge Frau atmet scharf ein. Für den Bruchteil einer Sekunde erscheint zwischen ihren Augenbrauen eine winzige Furche.{/n} "Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} erhält sein Leben nur, um seinem Haus zu dienen. Jeder unser Atemzüge, jedes Wort, jede Tat dienen nur dem Wohl und Reichtum unseres Hauses. Wenn Ihr mich anseht und nicht das Haus seht, seht Ihr nur einen flüchtigen Schatten. Wenn es das ist, was Euch interessiert, fragt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La jeune femme prend une grande inspiration et fronce les sourcils l'espace d'un instant.{/n} « Un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} est voué à servir sa maison ; c'est la raison même de notre naissance. Chaque souffle, chaque mot et chaque action doivent servir un seul et unique but : contribuer au bien et à la prospérité de notre maison. En me regardant moi, et non ma maison, vous ne regardez qu'une ombre. Mais si c'est là ce qui vous intéresse, alors allez-y, posez-moi vos questions. »
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}La jeune femme prend une grande inspiration et fronce les sourcils l'espace d'un instant.{/n} « Un {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} est voué à servir sa maison ; c'est la raison même de notre naissance. Chaque souffle, chaque mot et chaque action doivent servir un seul et unique but : contribuer au bien et à la prospérité de notre maison. En me regardant moi, et non ma maison, vous ne regardez qu'une ombre. Mais si c'est là ce qui vous intéresse, alors allez-y, posez-moi vos questions. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Genç kadın keskin bir nefes alıyor. Bir anlığına kaşları çatılır gibi oluyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacılar{/g} sadece Hanelerine hizmet için yaşar. Aldığımız her nefes, söylediğimiz her kelime ve elimizden çıkan her iş, Hanemizin iyiliği ve refahı içindir. Bana bakıp da Hanemi görmüyorsan sadece gelip geçici bir gölgeden ibaretim demektir. Madem ilgini çeken bu, o hâlde sor."
languages.original_text: {n}The young woman inhales sharply, a tiny furrow appearing between her eyebrows for a split second.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} is given life only to serve their House. Our every breath, every word, every deed is for the good and prosperity of our House. By looking at me and not seeing the House, you only see a fleeting shadow. If that is what interests you, ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç kadın keskin bir nefes alıyor. Bir anlığına kaşlarını azıcık çatıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}lar, sadece Hanelerine hizmet etmek için yaşar. Aldığımız her nefes, söylediğimiz her kelime ve elimizden çıkan her iş; Hanemizin iyiliği ve refahı içindir. Bana bakınca Hanemi görmezsen, sadece gelip geçici bir gölgeyi görüyorsun demektir. Madem ilgini çeken bu, o hâlde sor gitsin."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
